sources.title: Thrills and Chills (1938)
sources.description: Betty Boop and Pudgy take the train to a ski resort and enjoy the winter sports while Betty evades a masher. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/thrills-and-chills-1938/

metadata.Plot: Betty Boop and her pup, Pudgy, board a ski-train for a winter sports resort. Betty goes skating, but is annoyed by a skier. Meanwhile, Pudgy had been playing and prancing on the ice and gets marooned on a cake that breaks off and floats toward a waterfall. The skier picks up Betty and they rescue Pudy.
